name: OR_LOG_ADDENDA
description: The OR_LOG_ADDENDA table contains OR management system log addenda.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the addendum is attached to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of addendum in the surgical log.

columns.name: ADDENDA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the addendum.
